name: crossref-custom
title: Custom
description:
Use the `custom` option to `crossref` to define new types of cross reference. For example: 

```yaml
---
crossref:
  custom:
    - key: vid
      kind: float
      reference-prefix: Video
---
```

options.name: kind
options.description: The kind of cross reference (currently only "float" is supported).

options.name: reference-prefix
options.description: The prefix used in rendered references when referencing this type.

options.name: caption-prefix
options.description: The prefix used in rendered captions when referencing this type. If omitted, the field `reference-prefix` is used.

options.name: space-before-numbering
options.description: If false, use no space between crossref prefixes and numbering.

options.name: key
options.description: The key used to prefix reference labels of this type, such as "fig", "tbl", "lst", etc.

options.name: latex-env
options.description: In LaTeX output, the name of the custom environment to be used.

options.name: latex-list-of-file-extension
options.description: In LaTeX output, the extension of the auxiliary file used by LaTeX to collect names to be used in the custom "list of" command. If omitted, a string with prefix `lo` and suffix with the value of `ref-type` is used.

options.name: latex-list-of-description
options.description: The description of the crossreferenceable object to be used in the title of the "list of" command. If omitted, the field `reference-prefix` is used.

options.name: caption-location
options.description: The location of the caption relative to the crossreferenceable content.
